title: Boosting the maximized output energy density of triboelectric nanogenerator
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript

Ru Guo, Xin Xia, Hang Luo, Dou Zhang, Yunlong Zi
Volumetric energy density is a universal and the most important standardized figure-of-merit to quantify energy technologies, regardless of the operating mechanism, form of energy, energy scale, etc. In terms of...
